briefTitle: Collaborative Network to Take Responsibility for Oral Anticancer Therapy
officialTitle: CONTACT: A Prospective Interventional Multicentre Before-after Study for the Implementation of a Care Pathway to Increase Self-management of Patients With Cancer Who Are Treated With Oral Anticancer Medications
conditions: Breast Cancer, ALL, Lung Cancer, Melanoma, Colorectal Cancer, Prostate Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* a hematological cancer of solid tumor
* starting an oral anticancer drug for the first time
* able to understand and speak Dutch

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients following an adjuvant oral anticancer therapy (e.g. tamoxifen)
* patients following a therapy with a study drug
